attributes.action: To give informed consent to the mentally ill concerning the long term use of Anti-Psychotic medication
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The long term use of Anti-Psychotic medication, for many, who are advised to use it by their Doctors has little if any discernible and objective, long term, therapeutic benefit. However this medication has significant side affects. All patients are not currently informed of this and supported in different approaches to Recovery - particularly the most alienated who would most benefit from this approach.
